Posts.Content: Hello, Kahlua.  I just saw your message on the recent post list and just wanted to make sure that you know you are in the breast cancer section.  Did you know that we (thyroid cancer) have our own forum here on the cancer compass board?  It is filled with knowledgeable and kind people.  If you are interested, go back to the list of forums and select thyroid cancer.  hope to see you there .   ;)
Posts.Title: thyroid cancer
